A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This rating is based on the disappointed take on Luke Skywalker.  We waited 34 years to see him back in action only to never \"actually\" see him fight in the movie.  Very disappointed.  Very bad take on Skywalker. Lame reveal for Rey's parents\, if that's even true\, which hopefully it's not. Let's hope they somehow manage to recover in IX...
